decks.notes: The central idea of this deck revolves around aggressive play and quick damage output. The deck focuses on utilizing cheap, efficient spells like Stoke the Flames, Shock, Magma Jet, and Lightning Strike to deal damage quickly. It also includes powerful creatures like Young Pyromancer, Rakdos Cackler, Legion Loyalist, Goblin Rabblemaster, Firedrinker Satyr, and Chandra's Phoenix. To enhance the deck's speed and consistency, it includes Mutavault as a versatile land option. Overall, the goal is to establish board presence early on and overwhelm the opponent with a constant onslaught of creatures and burn spells.

The key focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of powerful creatures, planeswalkers, and removal spells. The deck aims to ramp up mana quickly with cards like Elvish Mystic and Sylvan Caryatid, allowing for the early deployment of threats such as Courser of Kruphix and Nissa, Worldwaker. The planeswalkers, Chandra, Pyromaster and Xenagos, the Reveler, provide card advantage and additional threats. The deck also includes a variety of removal spells like Bile Blight, Dreadbore, and Mizzium Mortars to handle opposing threats. Ultimately, the goal is to control the game, disrupt the opponent's plans, and win in the late game.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by using a combination of removal spells, planeswalkers, and powerful creatures. The deck aims to dismantle the opponent's plans by using cards like Mizzium Mortars and Dreadbore to remove threats from the board. It also focuses on ramping up the mana with cards like Xenagos, the Reveler and Elvish Mystic to play big creatures like Polukranos, World Eater and Nissa, Worldwaker. The land base is designed to provide the necessary colors of mana to cast the spells and creatures efficiently.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through the use of removal spells and powerful planeswalkers, while ramping up mana with mana dorks and lands to cast big threats like Rakdos's Return. Utilizing a combination of green, red, and black cards, the deck aims to dominate the battlefield and eventually overwhelm the opponent with its versatile creatures and spells. By efficiently managing resources and disrupting the opponent's strategy, this Jund Control deck seeks to secure victory through attrition and resource advantage.

The main concept of this Naya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and aggressive spells. By utilizing cards like Boros Reckoner, Fleecemane Lion, and Ghor-Clan Rampager, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and deal significant damage quickly. With a focus on efficient mana usage and good creature spells, the deck seeks to control the board and outpace the opponent, ultimately leading to a swift victory through a combination of creature attacks and direct damage spells.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive and powerful black creatures while also utilizing devotion to black to fuel abilities and effects. The deck focuses on controlling the board with removal spells such as Bile Blight and Hero's Downfall, and gaining card advantage and life with cards like Thoughtseize and Gray Merchant of Asphodel. The inclusion of cards like Nightveil Specter and Pack Rat allows for additional card advantage and versatility. With a strong mana base and various ways to draw cards, the deck aims to maintain a dominant board presence and quickly deplete the opponent's life total.

This Red Deck Wins deck focuses on aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By utilizing efficient creatures like Goblin Rabblemaster and Legion Loyalist, combined with burn spells like Lightning Strike and Stoke the Flames, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and win the game quickly. The inclusion of cards like Ash Zealot and Firedrinker Satyr adds additional pressure to the opponent, while cards like Mutavault and Hall of Triumph provide versatility and support to the aggressive strategy. The goal is to maintain a fast pace and finish the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive black creatures while also utilizing devotion to black to power up Gray Merchant of Asphodel for massive life drain. The deck includes a mix of powerful black creatures like Desecration Demon and Nightveil Specter, along with disruption and removal spells like Thoughtseize, Hero's Downfall, and Devour Flesh to control the board and protect your creatures. The inclusion of Mutavault and Pack Rat adds versatility and resilience to the deck's strategy.

This deck focuses on a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing a combination of powerful creatures like Stormbreath Dragon and Polukranos, World Eater along with mana acceleration from cards like Elvish Mystic and Sylvan Caryatid. Domri Rade and Xenagos, the Reveler provide additional support and card advantage. With a mix of removal spells and versatile creatures, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents early in the game and maintain pressure throughout. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements and ensure consistency in casting its threats.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by ramping up mana quickly using green mana producers like Elvish Mystic, Voyaging Satyr, and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx. This mana acceleration allows you to play powerful creatures like Arbor Colossus, Polukranos, World Eater, and Prime Speaker Zegana ahead of schedule. Support cards like Kiora, the Crashing Wave, Cyclonic Rift, and Domri Rade help you maintain board control and disrupt your opponent's strategy. The goal is to overwhelm your opponent with large creatures and powerful spells before they have a chance to respond.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with aggressive creatures like Young Pyromancer and Chandra's Phoenix, backed up by powerful burn spells such as Warleader's Helix and Stoke the Flames. The deck also includes efficient removal spells like Lightning Strike and Searing Blood to maintain board control, while cards like Skullcrack and Boros Charm provide additional damage and protection. With a mana base that allows for consistent aggression and minimal mana disruption, this deck aims to quickly close out games before opponents have a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on using aggressive black creatures and removal spells to quickly diminish the opponent's life total. By utilizing cards that require a high black devotion, such as Gray Merchant of Asphodel and Whip of Erebos, the deck can drain the opponent's life while continuously applying pressure with creatures like Pack Rat and Desecration Demon. Thoughtseize and Hero's Downfall offer disruption and removal options, while Underworld Connections provides card advantage. The deck's main goal is to keep the opponent on the defensive and secure a quick victory through aggressive plays.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm opponents with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. By utilizing a combination of efficient threats like Young Pyromancer, Goblin Rabblemaster, and Chandra's Phoenix, along with burn spells like Shock, Stoke the Flames, and Lightning Strike, the deck aims to consistently deal damage to the opponent's life total. The inclusion of key cards like Mutavault, Purphoros, God of the Forge, and Hall of Triumph further enhances the deck's ability to quickly close out games through fast and powerful plays.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize aggressive black creatures and removal spells to quickly control the board and deplete the opponent's life total. By focusing on devotion to black mana symbols, the deck aims to take advantage of powerful black permanents such as Pack Rat, Desecration Demon, and Gray Merchant of Asphodel to overwhelm the opponent. Thoughtseize and Hero's Downfall provide additional disruption and removal, while cards like Underworld Connections and Nightveil Specter help generate card advantage and maintain pressure on the opponent.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of removal spells, planeswalkers, and mana acceleration to control the game and grind out value over time. By disrupting the opponent's board while generating card advantage with cards like Read the Bones and Nissa, Worldwaker, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and establish a dominant board presence with powerful threats like Xenagos, the Reveler and Vraska the Unseen. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the diverse color requirements of the deck while also providing consistent access to the necessary resources.

This deck focuses on generating fast early game aggression through cards like Elvish Mystic, Goblin Rabblemaster, and Ghor-Clan Rampager, supported by mana ramp and fixing from cards like Sylvan Caryatid and Xenagos, the Reveler. The mid to late game threats come from powerful creatures like Polukranos, World Eater and Stormbreath Dragon, backed up by removal spells like Mizzium Mortars and Dreadbore. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast, efficient creatures and removal spells, maintaining pressure throughout the game.
